flavorText: "Time is fluid as a dance, and truth as fleeting."

foreignData.flavorText: „Die Zeit ist fließend wie ein Tanz und die Wahrheit genauso vergänglich."
foreignData.name: Prophetin des Kruphix
foreignData.text:
Enttappe während des Enttappsegments jedes anderen Spielers alle Kreaturen und Länder, die du kontrollierst.
Du kannst Kreaturenkarten wirken, als ob sie Aufblitzen hätten.

foreignData.flavorText: "El tiempo es fluido como una danza, y la verdad es igual de efímera".
foreignData.name: Profeta de Krufix
foreignData.text:
Durante el paso de enderezar de cada uno de los demás jugadores, endereza todas las criaturas y tierras que controles.
Puedes lanzar las cartas de criatura como si tuvieran la habilidad de destello.

foreignData.flavorText: « Le temps est aussi fluide qu'un pas de danse, et la vérité aussi changeante. »
foreignData.name: Prophétesse de Kruphix
foreignData.text:
Dégagez toutes les créatures et tous les terrains que vous contrôlez pendant l'étape de dégagement de chaque autre joueur.
Vous pouvez lancer des cartes de créature comme si elles avaient le flash.

foreignData.flavorText: "Il tempo è fluido come una danza e la verità è altrettanto effimera."
foreignData.name: Profetessa di Krufix
foreignData.text:
STAPpa tutte le creature e le terre che controlli durante lo STAP di ogni altro giocatore.
Puoi lanciare carte creatura come se avessero lampo.

foreignData.flavorText: 「時間はダンスのように流れやすい。真実もまた、かように儚い。」
foreignData.name: クルフィックスの預言者
foreignData.text:
他の各プレイヤーのアンタップ・ステップに、あなたがコントロールするすべてのクリーチャーとすべての土地をアンタップする。
 あなたはクリーチャー・カードを、それが瞬速を持っているかのように唱えてもよい。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間・ウィザード

foreignData.flavorText: "시간과 진실은 춤과도 같아서 부질없이 흐르고 순식간에 끝나지."
foreignData.name: 크루픽스의 예언자
foreignData.text:
다른 각 플레이어의 언탭단에, 당신이 조종하는 모든 생물과 대지를 언탭한다.
당신은 생물 카드를 섬광 능력을 가진 것처럼 발동할 수 있다.

foreignData.flavorText: "O tempo é fluido como uma dança, e a verdade, igualmente fugaz."
foreignData.name: Profeta de Crufix
foreignData.text:
Desvire todas as criaturas e terrenos que você controla durante a etapa de desvirar de cada um dos outros jogadores.
Você pode conjurar cards de criatura como se tivessem lampejo.

foreignData.flavorText: «Время быстротечно, словно танец, а истина — так же неуловима».
foreignData.name: Прорицательница Круфикса
foreignData.text:
Разверните все существа и земли под вашим контролем во время шага разворота каждого другого игрока.
Вы можете разыгрывать не являющиеся землями карты существ, как будто у них есть Миг.

foreignData.flavorText: 「时间如舞蹈般流畅，而真相飞逝。」
foreignData.name: 克鲁菲斯的先知
foreignData.text:
于其他牌手的重置步骤中，重置所有由你操控的生物和地。
你可以将生物牌视同具有闪现异能地来施放。

foreignData.flavorText: 「時間如舞蹈般流暢，而真相飛逝。」
foreignData.name: 克魯菲斯的先知
foreignData.text:
於其他玩家的重置步驟中，重置所有由你操控的生物和地。
你可以將生物牌視同具有閃現異能地來施放。

name: Prophet of Kruphix
originalText:
Untap all creatures and lands you control during each other player's untap step.
You may cast creature cards as though they had flash.

rulings.text: Creatures and lands you control untap at the same time as the active player’s permanents. You can’t choose to not untap them at that time.
Effects that state a creature or land you control doesn’t untap during your untap step won’t apply during another player’s untap step.
Controlling more than one Prophet of Kruphix doesn’t allow you to untap any creature or land more than once during a single untap step.

If you’re casting a creature spell with bestow, whether or not it has flash will depend on if you’re casting it as a creature or as an Aura. Prophet of Kruphix won’t give flash to a spell with bestow you’re casting as an Aura.

The last ability applies to creature cards in any zone, provided something is allowing you to cast them. For example, if you control a Zombie, you could cast Gravecrawler (a creature with “You may cast Gravecrawler from your graveyard as long as you control a Zombie”) from your graveyard as though it had flash.

text:
Untap all creatures and lands you control during each other player's untap step.
You may cast creature spells as though they had flash.
